company_info.name: TechHive
company_info.description: TechHive is Pakistan's leading e-commerce platform for authentic tech products, offering laptops, smartphones, gaming consoles, accessories, and more.
company_info.mission: To provide genuine tech products with exceptional customer service and competitive prices.

policies.return_policy: 30-day return policy on most products. Items must be unused and in original packaging.
policies.warranty: All products come with manufacturer warranty. Extended warranty available on select items.
policies.shipping: Free shipping on orders over Rs. 5,000. Standard delivery within 3-5 business days.
policies.payment_methods: Cash on Delivery, Credit/Debit Cards, JazzCash, EasyPaisa, Bank Transfer

email_footer.unsubscribe_text: Don't want to receive these emails?
email_footer.disclaimer: This email was sent to you because you are a valued TechHive customer. Please add support@techhive.com to your address book to ensure delivery.
